# CFStringTokenizerTokenType

**Structure**

Token types returned by [doc://com.apple.corefoundation/documentation/CoreFoundation/CFStringTokenizerGoToTokenAtIndex(_:_:)] and [doc://com.apple.corefoundation/documentation/CoreFoundation/CFStringTokenizerAdvanceToNextToken(_:)].

## Declaration

```swift
struct CFStringTokenizerTokenType
```

## Overview

See [http://www.unicode.org/reports/tr29/#Word_Boundaries] for a detailed description of word boundaries.

## Constants

- **normal**: Has a normal token.
- **hasSubTokensMask**: Compound token which may contain subtokens but with no derived subtokens.
- **hasDerivedSubTokensMask**: Compound token which may contain derived subtokens.
- **hasHasNumbersMask**: Appears to contain a number.
- **hasNonLettersMask**: Contains punctuation, symbols, and so on.
- **isCJWordMask**: Contains kana and/or ideographs.

## Initializers

- **init(rawValue:)**

## Constants

- **Tokenization Modifiers**: Tokenization options are used with [doc://com.apple.corefoundation/documentation/CoreFoundation/CFStringTokenizerCreate(_:_:_:_:_:)] to specify how the string should be tokenized

## Conforms To

- BitwiseCopyable
- Equatable
- ExpressibleByArrayLiteral
- OptionSet
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
- SetAlgebra
